Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the video proves beyond a shadow of a doubt that COVID-19 is a US biological weapon.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to support the assertion that the US threatened Iraq with coronavirus.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the misspelled word "CORVID-19" in the tweet refers to COVID-19, when in fact it refers to a family of birds called Corvid.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no mention of the word "virus" in the original video, but the manufactured clip includes multiple mentions of the word "virus."
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the video has been manipulated and edited to give a false impression, as mentioned in the expert's verdict.
